name: Case Closed Runner
description:
Run! Dash! Jump!
Enjoy the run game based on the famous Japanese animated TV series a.k.a "Case Closed"!

"Case Closed" debuts in an official run game!
Solve the mysteries and enjoy the thrill of the run with Conan and his friends!

Race, Collect, and Close the Case!

◆ Recommended for:

・Fans of runner games
・Players who like to play run games
・Those who want to try free run games
・Those who usually play runner game apps
・Fans of Japanese anime
・Players who likes anime game
・Those who enjoy watching Conan and friends solve challenging cases
・Fans of "Case Closed" anime
・Players who enjoy "Case Closed" games
・Those looking for a game with simple controls
・Those who like detective games and novels
・Fans of "Case Closed"'s voice talents

◆ Gameplay

・Runner

Join the adorable Conan and his friends as they run, overcome obstacles, and collect points to chase down suspects.

User-friendly gameplay of tapping the screen to make the characters jump allows the game to be accessible to anyone.

Each character also has their own unique skill that can give you an advantage when used in the game.

・Scenario

Each area brings you to the challenging cases Conan and the others have previously faced.

Enjoy the deduction techniques of Conan as they solve case after case.

・Illustrations

By tapping on the characters set in the Home menu, players will be able to enjoy the voice acting of characters like Conan Edogawa.

Various character illustrations will be available in the game, and players will be able to set the illustrations they have collected in the Home menu.

There are also plans to continue adding more original illustrations down the line.
